Well hi there.

I'm a front-end web developer, currenty working at Perficient XD. I have a passion for learning, and for using my knowledge to help others learn.

I'm also a father to an incredible (and terribly tiresome) toddler, and a husband to the most amazing woman I've ever had the pleasure of marrying. I spend most of my time doing my best to annoy them.
